title: Bug 4971 - Strange 'copy package'
description: When performing the 'copy package' operation in the Eclipse IDE (version 2031) from the org.eclipse.jdt.internal.ui in jdt.ui3 module, strange behavior is observed. The steps to reproduce the issue are as follows.
OB: Upon selecting a package in project A from the package viewer and choosing the 'copy' option from the context menu, unexpected behavior occurs.
EB: The expected behavior is that the 'copy package' operation should successfully duplicate the selected package in the project.
SR:
To reproduce the issue: 

1. Create a new project named xxx. 
2. Open the package viewer within the project. 
3. Select a package in project A. 
4. From the context menu, choose the 'copy' option.
